General.Name: Qinghaihuading Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: QingHai HuaDing Industrial CO.,LTD. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of CNC machine tools, elevator accessories, and lighting equipment in China. The company offers CNC heavy-duty horizontal, roll, and railway special lathes; milling machines; special mechanical and environmental protection equipment; vertical and horizontal machining center series products; and scroll compressors, gearcboxes, key components of precision transmission, etc. Its products are used in general machinery, construction machinery, steel, aerospace, rail transit, automobiles, auto parts, general lighting, and other industries. The company is also engaged in metal products, and culture and art business; manufacturing of general purpose equipment; and research and trial development, as well as provides capital markets, science and technology promotion and application, and commerce services. QingHai HuaDing Industrial CO.,LTD. was founded in 1998 and is based in Xining, the People's Republic of China.
